displayName: EM Standalone Provisioning and Patch Automation Pack
rationale: EM Standalone Provisioning and Patch Automation Pack requires a license for Oracle Provisioning and Patch Automation Pack to use.
recommended_action:
Disable unneeded Packs in Grid Control: https://docs.oracle.com/cd/E63000_01/OEMLI/introduction.htm#OEMLI108
This should be checked every time a new target is added to Grid Control since many Packs are defaulted to "Enabled"
error_message: EM Standalone Provisioning and Patch Automation Pack is listed as a feature usage concern under Oracle Provisioning and Patch Automation Pack
ruleNames: EM Standalone Provisioning and Patch Automation Pack
